import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FilterAction from "../Store/Action/FilterAction"; import SearchBarAction from '../Store/Action/SearchBarAction' const FilterPanel = () => { const [isChecked, setI] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const reqpayload = useSelector(state => state.SearchBarReducer?.FilterdataPayload) const SidebarFilterData = useSelector(state => state.FilterReducer?.SidebarFilterdata) console.log(SidebarFilterData) useEffect(() => { FilterAction(dispatch, reqpayload) }, [reqpayload]) const changehandler = (e) => { setN(e.target.checked) } return <>
